conversations.question: What are the common symptoms of the flu?
conversations.answer: Common symptoms of the flu include fever, chills, cough, sore throat, runny nose, muscle aches, and fatigue.

conversations.question: How can I prevent catching a cold?
conversations.answer: Wash your hands frequently, avoid touching your face, and maintain a healthy immune system with a balanced diet and exercise.

conversations.question: What are the early signs of diabetes?
conversations.answer: Early signs of diabetes include frequent urination, excessive thirst, unexplained weight loss, increased hunger, and fatigue.

conversations.question: How can I reduce high blood pressure naturally?
conversations.answer: Eat a heart-healthy diet, exercise regularly, reduce stress, and limit salt and alcohol consumption.
